text: Wow, no se te escapa ninguna amigo, jejejeje realmente este anime era muy sangriento para mi gusto, pero siempre disfrute de este tema.
author: jorgais reyes

text: This anime and I have our differences. It scared me to death as a child and ruined all hope for an innocent mind, I in turn never watched it again for many years. But now that I've come back to it I have to say, this is certainly a masterpiece of an Anime. If only there had been a second season to end the manga version...

text:
This was an good anime, if you don't mind certain elements that is. Usually i try to avoid gore but the story just takes such strong grip, that i had to watch it all.
So far i have seen only one anime (out of 85), that i wont recommend to anyone [School days]. (seriously don't watch it)
author: Tomba871

text:
This anime is one of my favorites...Great story, great characters, great animations.
Gory? Yes. Depressing? Absolutly. But worth it. It's one of those anime that makes you think about what you just saw, not just walk away after an episode. SupraDarky, give a try, that's my advice.
author: Ehunkel

text: @SupraDarky Your mileage may vary... Some people find it depressing or disturbing, for others it crosses the line into absurdity. The manga is longer and definitely has a different (And somewhat more traditional) emphasis imho. Definitely agree on the quality of the OP though, it and the title sequence are definitely lovely.
author: Geralt's Bathwater

text: It is a very depressing and dark anime... Although it is still amazing. It really pulls you into the story and it feels like you can connect to the people in it... I watched this anime and I love it. It's really good despite the sadness that comes with it. I think the darkness in it helps to pull you in and make you end up loving it and respecting it. Always watching anime that is always happy isn't always the best. I hope you enjoy it! ^.^
author: Proficiency

text: @SupraDarky No spoilers of course, I totally respect that :) I've been subscribed to you for quite some time now, and you had me surprised when I saw the name of this vid in between your uploads! Didn't know you watched anime! I have to say, yes it is a bit of a depressing anime, but it IS indeed a very good one in my humble opinion! I still haven't read the manga cause I haven't found it in English around here in Europe yet.. So if anybody finds it.. Please tell! Have fun watching the anime SD!
